```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(gov.1005.data)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
congress %>%
  arrange(desc(age))
```

```{r}
age_data <- congress %>%
  filter(party %in% c("D", "R")) %>%
  group_by(year, party) %>% 
  summarise(avg_age = mean(age))

ggplot(age_data, aes(year, avg_age)) + 
  geom_line(aes(color = ifelse(party == "R", 'blue', 'red'))) +
  xlim(1945, 2015) +
  ylim(35, 65)


```
